data.text:
#TimeIsNow for a gender-equal 🌍!
On #WomensDay, join activists everywhere to celebrate, take action & help transform women’s lives! #IWD2018 https://t.co/cMof9bppQu https://t.co/HMhIxfFw9L
It's #Oscars Sunday! Did you know that a UN-produced film won a 1947 Academy Award? See: https://t.co/P4rxTwxKLF https://t.co/ZS0G0hAPz6

"I want to keep thriving in this work that I like."

Meet Natalia, a UN peacekeeper from Uruguay who has travelled far from home to help others in need. ⬇️ #ServingForPeace https://t.co/k9kZzUzN8N

UN Peacekeepers from China work to stabilise regions in conflict and help keep us all safer. Thank you, China, for your service & sacrifice. https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ  #ServingForPeace https://t.co/JhFwccBmA6
We need young people to rise up to build a better 🌍. Do you have what it takes to be one of the @UNEP #YoungChamps? Apply ➡️ https://t.co/49v00udkLX https://t.co/u4Lh3uGjuW

Every woman & every girl has the right to a life free of violence.

Safe spaces in Myanmar help victims understand their rights and seek help 👉 https://t.co/KVGSVcZa8t via @UNFPAMMR https://t.co/1DxLW4hLc5
UNICEF immunizes 45% of the world's children against deadly diseases, saving the lives of 3 million children a year: https://t.co/ZL68RePcWC https://t.co/qXujeFNnmB
How are cuts in funding to @UNRWA affecting those living in Gaza? Hear from those affected by the humanitarian, political & security situation in this new podcast https://t.co/wUcquJ6wwY
Meet military & police officers from 🇨🇳 #servingforpeace around the world with @unpeacekeeping in our new @instagram story. https://t.co/UH4OQBPYqm cc @Chinamission2un https://t.co/Q5DRWJI4PE

#TimeIsNow: Ahead of next week's #WomensDay, @UNWomen explains how you can be a women’s rights advocate ⬇️ #IWD2018

https://t.co/2qRa66MT0h

Even in the face of headwinds & hatred, we must uphold the values of the UN Charter. But we can only do that together, as United Nations & one human family -- @antonioguterres https://t.co/kKdsIVBps1 https://t.co/SIf5TrW9Wc

Activism & gender equality will be the focus of a special #WomensDay @facebook live event this week at the UN in NYC. 

Join the online convo & ask Q using #AskIWD now. https://t.co/HFfQZ9TjpX

If you can't reuse it, refuse it!

Get more ideas to #BeatPollution & help achieve #CleanSeas: https://t.co/nkq6K6pR0v via @UNEP https://t.co/0EhwewwyL1

Big cat populations are declining due to:
🔸 loss of habitat & prey
🔸 poaching
🔸 illegal trade

Wildlife is our shared heritage, let's protect it! https://t.co/tySvapFv5X
#WorldWildlifeDay https://t.co/YkSjmwJM18

On #WomensDay in NYC, @SwedenUN, @UN_Women, @WikimediaNYC & others will join forces to work to close the internet gender gap.

Log on for equality, be a #Wikigap editor: https://t.co/13Ji2hxA18 https://t.co/qmm7SJlFai

Survivors of violent extremism often suffer in silence.

@UNDP is helping make their voices heard. Meet survivors here: https://t.co/iO2MeVX9o2 https://t.co/a8fvYWk1R3

Let us act together to help ensure the survival of the world’s big cats & all of our planet’s precious & fragile biological diversity. -- @antonioguterres on #WorldWildlifeDay https://t.co/CulQj7SE1y https://t.co/C4LZ6UncGx

In line with ancient tradition, a pet sheep protects Senegalese peacekeepers with the @UNAMIDnews peacekeeping mission in Darfur.  

We thank the 3000+ military and police officers from Senegal who are currently #ServingForPeace. https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ https://t.co/n0Qp73xFZ8
On Saturday's #WorldWildlifeDay, celebrate your favourite big cat by finding your kindred species & taking the Big Cat Challenge: https://t.co/cKvpOifPxg https://t.co/akq7ue4PZB

UN Peacekeepers from China leave their families behind and risk their lives to help others. We thank them for their service & sacrifice. https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ
 #ServingForPeace https://t.co/NonYEkWJLi
Wildlife conservation is a shared responsibility. On Saturday's #WorldWildlifeDay, let's all commit to #ProtectBigCats. Get involved: https://t.co/tySvapX6ux https://t.co/QJEYVkt07j

Mission accomplished!

@UNMILNews, established in 2003 after 2nd Liberian Civil War, closes at the end of March. More on the @UNPeacekeeping mission's achievements here: https://t.co/gLAvdrWwVA #ServingForPeace https://t.co/3ORNj4GYI3
Revisiting prevention in an interdependent world -- find out about a new UN & @WorldBank "Pathways for Peace" report https://t.co/MbGpFWsvpW https://t.co/KdWbgA6HNU
This midwife is helping mothers & babies affected by the Boko Haram crisis in a @UNICEF-supported clinic. https://t.co/Z91wisuF4S
#FBF to the UNHQ in 1964. Our headquarters are in #NYC, but the work of the UN touches lives of people all over the 🌏. Here's what we do: https://t.co/MGT7G5Mqxj https://t.co/OOWaZRkNRV

Humanity
Neutrality
Impartiality
Independence

These are the 4 principles guiding the UN's humanitarian work. More here: https://t.co/zhMibwGCrV https://t.co/JXLtLoHu3G

Extinction looms for 🦁 and many at-risk big cats need our protection. 

See how you can help: https://t.co/mSObKGTbHL https://t.co/ePiSlLWSeW

China is the second-largest financial contributor to @UNPeacekeeping.

Thank you, China, for your service & sacrifice. https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ  #ServingForPeace https://t.co/ckyv9n9tce
For the 1st time in history, the UN has achieved gender parity among its senior leaders. Find out more in our @Instagram story ➡️ handle: unitednations https://t.co/mfVTkmNb5T

Prevention - Treatment - Rehabilitation - Social Integration

are key to reducing drug abuse.

Anti-narcotics panel calls for greater investment in drug treatment services in #INCBannualreport ➡️https://t.co/cYTfUjk0K3 https://t.co/uE3Xn6qp2f

Just in time for #ZeroDiscrimination Day: #TBT to Feb last year when we joined forces with #TeamSmurfs to spread the word about the #GlobalGoals. Speak out against discrimination: https://t.co/mOf1dI0atM https://t.co/yvaSJaSh3S
Thursday: @NLatUN takes on rotating Security Council presidency for the month of March. https://t.co/lvkdOGSO0e #KNLprez https://t.co/2KKLSAQt2g

Discrimination is often based on misinformation or fear of the unknown. No one should ever be discriminated against because of their HIV status, gender identity or race. 

Thursday is #ZeroDiscrimination Day: https://t.co/iJUAl03Xzu https://t.co/n2YfNRdR12
Innovation is 🔑 to achieving the #GlobalGoals & creating a better 🌍 for everyone. More on why innovation matters here: https://t.co/bd1ro5zEsR https://t.co/DYHJWYuBZS

Discrimination based on sexual orientation is a violation of human rights.
On Thursday's #ZeroDiscrimination Day, let's stand up for everyone's right to live free from discrimination https://t.co/mOf1dI0atM https://t.co/EJa9Txc7K6

After 7 years of conflict in Syria, the UN continues to provide humanitarian assistance to those in need while working tirelessly to bring parties to the negotiating table to end the crisis. 

Get updates here: https://t.co/lp458P0W7J https://t.co/MJsmoUZloz

Meet Tasmin Fatima, one of the Rohingya women refugees earning money to support their families through @UNmigration's cash for work programme ⬇️ https://t.co/PgC8i3Py0Q 

 https://t.co/HhjDnxalSy
8 March is International Women's Day. Join activists around the 🌍 to celebrate and take action to transform women’s lives. https://t.co/RNBBXAxBau

Happening now: UN Security Council meeting on the situation in Guinea-Bissau and the situation in the Middle East.

Watch live: https://t.co/WhwXXmCYWf

UN peacekeepers from Senegal work to stabilise regions in conflict & help keep us all safer. Find out more about these brave men & women #ServingForPeace in our @Instagram story ➡️ handle: unitednations https://t.co/lW1rJEo3Kk
What does @antonioguterres mean when he says he wants to strengthen the UN's prevention efforts? He explains in his new article in @_UNChronicle here: https://t.co/xRouYSzoXJ https://t.co/xZnRNIipoi
Syria: Military operations in besieged eastern Ghouta continue, with attacks claiming lives of 30 people. https://t.co/GBV6HYDrjp https://t.co/XDOEIcpbE5

"Everyone, everywhere can do something to make our world more safe, sustainable and secure." 
-- Secretary-General @AntonioGuterres https://t.co/3HoL4BNhNN
Military & police officers from Senegal are currently #ServingForPeace in six @UNPeacekeeping missions. We thank them for their service & sacrifice. https://t.co/lZYeCp9I0z https://t.co/yLINSCvZF2
Hunger & conflict destabilize countries, destroy economies & force migration. We need peace to reach #ZeroHunger. https://t.co/rKrCI6rEFW

Happening now: UN Security Council meeting on Sudan & South Sudan. 

Watch live: https://t.co/WhwXXmCYWf

Every day, all around the 🌎, nurses are saving lives. But there is a global shortage of health workers, in particular nurses & midwives. https://t.co/hlIwvK0Oyo #NursingNow2020 https://t.co/cWY8FKmi15
Starting now: Security Council meeting on the situation in the Middle East. Watch live: https://t.co/WhwXXmCYWf
.@UNIFIL_ works with 10,500 peacekeepers from 41 countries to keep peace in Lebanon: https://t.co/eGvvtukIR2 #ServingForPeace https://t.co/D1RvPYmcxh

If you can't reuse it, refuse it!

Get more ideas to #BeatPollution & help achieve #CleanSeas: https://t.co/nkq6K6pR0v via @UNEP https://t.co/gG8nNelANz

“Each gas attack, each nuclear test, takes us into greater danger. We cannot contemplate further erosion of the global framework for disarmament.” - @antonioguterres to #ConferenceOnDisarmament https://t.co/31pcqKk0RV

Schools should provide a safe haven for children to grow, learn, thrive & succeed.

Stand up. Speak out. #EndViolence in schools now. https://t.co/8uyGi7F4Gg https://t.co/0CxudySUa3

Senegal provides 3000+ military & police officers to @UNPeacekeeping - brave men & women who leave their families behind to help others. We thank them for their service & sacrifice. https://t.co/lZYeCp9I0z #ServingForPeace https://t.co/LFprMIDifu

Happening now: UN Security Council meeting on the situation in the Middle East.

Watch live: https://t.co/WhwXXmCYWf https://t.co/SXdVcUZfSi
.@UNHumanRights chief Zeid calls on all of us to #StandUp4HumanRights ➡️ https://t.co/2ftXxLBj0g https://t.co/8JALYI9t1q

Happening now: UN Security Council meeting on the situation in Burundi and the situation in Middle East.

Watch live: https://t.co/WhwXXmCYWf
Continues this week in Geneva, Conference on Disarmament (through 30 Mar):  https://t.co/oMxVBFjO9n https://t.co/dbnkvPqdiR

More than 120 countries provide military & police officers to @UNPeacekeeping.
Peacekeepers serve at great personal risk & under harsh conditions to help others. https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ #ServingForPeace https://t.co/vdKQC2BXZw
Starts this week at @UNGeneva: Human Rights Council, 37th session (through 16 March): https://t.co/fP2IyiwwhA https://t.co/xRGWbgqDwA
What's happening this week at the UN? #ZeroDiscrimination Day, #WorldWildlifeDay & much more. List of events is here: https://t.co/U76dONw7SD https://t.co/MBLwx2m9Vu

UN peacekeepers leave their families behind & put themselves at risk to help others. We thank the more than 900 Uruguayan peacekeepers who are currently #ServingForPeace for their service & sacrifice: https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ https://t.co/N7VXrlGzTR
Climate change is real & it affects every country on every continent. But climate action is unstoppable & will benefit ALL of us https://t.co/roJjv7ZtSS https://t.co/k71uZDQo1e

🇺🇾 Uruguay provides 900+ military & police officers to @UNPeacekeeping. Find out more about these brave men & women #ServingForPeace in our @Instagram story ➡️ handle: unitednations https://t.co/FsJG75hDgE
Do you know how much sugar you consume every day? @WHO recommends consuming no more than 12 teaspoons of sugar per day.  #BeatNCDs https://t.co/gJQOHbGn74
Here's a list of 10 ways the UN makes a difference in the lives of millions every day. See what else we do: https://t.co/MGT7G5Mqxj https://t.co/WK8kGTzQQ1

1.3 billion tonnes of food is lost or wasted every year. 
@FAOnews has tips for how YOU can reduce food waste & take action for a #ZeroHunger 🌍: https://t.co/Ewfm28Hu3s https://t.co/u6tpQNh3fS

Are you working on great climate action project? 

Applications are open for the 2018 @Momentum_UNFCCC Awards! Apply now: https://t.co/eTUAGe2j28 #GlobalGoals https://t.co/rTxg4iazrq
For the 1st time in history, the UN has achieved gender parity among its senior leaders. @antonioguterres aims to reach parity at all levels. https://t.co/PNXoJUpZSp

Spreading smiles...

@MINUSCA peacekeepers from Portugal donate toys to children affected by conflict in the Central African Republic. More 📸 here: https://t.co/Cs9kSrB9nv https://t.co/vUjhGXiXnA

When will our oceans be free from plastic pollution?

The #GlobalGoals aim to make oceans cleaner #by2030. Find out more from @UNDP ➡️ https://t.co/x4TK7jkkKX #SaveOurOcean https://t.co/6KgQ4AoLxw

UN Security Council unanimously adopts a resolution calling for a 30-day cessation of hostilities in Syria to enable delivery of humanitarian aid: https://t.co/Gk23b1WKfC

Watch live: https://t.co/WhwXXmCYWf https://t.co/aJmN72Ngnn

Starting now: UN Security Council meeting on the situation in the Middle East. 

Watch LIVE: https://t.co/WhwXXmCYWf https://t.co/MaAgxkRDIb
More than 1 in 3 women face violence in their lifetime. Here's is how it impacts their health ⬇️ - via @who https://t.co/ot5G3cKKhF

UN Peacekeepers come from different countries, cultures & backgrounds --
but share a common purpose to protect the most vulnerable. https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ #ServingForPeace https://t.co/DrGlrn9hwF

Stop - Prevent - Protect

The UN is working to make zero tolerance for sexual exploitation & abuse a reality. Latest figures here: https://t.co/U5gABka5m4 https://t.co/sOJj4K3yaj

“I‘m very happy to have twins,” says Yvonne, who was pregnant when she fled the violence in the Democratic Republic of the Congo. 

See how @UNFPAAngola supports refugee mothers like Yvonne: https://t.co/hQuUyO89mg via @UNFPA #WithRefugees https://t.co/d15SSt11kZ

#FBF to 1961: This girl was among the more than 1 million refugees registered with @UNRWA. Today #UNRWA provides assistance & protection to over 5M Palestine refugees. You can help ➡️ https://t.co/jMVvZmPBF3 #DignityIsPriceless https://t.co/XUqJ9FIDlx
~800,000 people die due to suicide every year. But suicides are preventable. Find out more from @WHO https://t.co/drllacAgiV https://t.co/H2NFF3lbJ0

When will poverty be history? 

The #GlobalGoals aim to make the world a better place #by2030. Find out more from @UNDP ➡️ https://t.co/x4TK7jkkKX https://t.co/g8PEhqfE6h

UN Peacekeepers from Uruguay work to stabilise regions in conflict & help keep us all safer. Thank you, Uruguay, for your service & sacrifice. https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ  #ServingForPeace https://t.co/leAExNdI3G

🔹 Equal rights
🔹 Non-discrimination
🔹 Tolerance 

The values of the UN Charter are values for us all to live by. 
Get the UN Charter app in 6 languages here ➡️ iOS: https://t.co/qNkSg6ccHr  Android: https://t.co/j1lfoP4E9s https://t.co/j0pH0mFI4X

Uruguay provides 900+ military & police officers to @UNPeacekeeping - brave men & women who leave their families behind to help others. We thank them for their service & sacrifice. https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ #ServingForPeace https://t.co/ZWMWlQYB7W
.@UNESCO is helping work for #PressFreedom around the world. Here is an update from Ukraine 👉 https://t.co/R7Vo3wujNb https://t.co/DBzMSNo2cM
We are looking for inspiring stories on how sustainable energy affects communities in the Least Developed Countries. Submit your story here: https://t.co/QW2lEDQ9PL https://t.co/VpuSapa9AX

On Wednesday's #MotherLanguageDay & every day, the UN tweets in many languages:

بالعربية @UNarabic
En Français @ONU_fr
Kwa Kiswahili @UmojaWaMataifa
Em Português @NacoesUnidas
на русском @UnitedNationsRU
En Español @ONU_es https://t.co/JrPQlcMOn3

Palestine refugees depend on @UNRWA's help to access education & healthcare, but funding cuts threaten those services.

@antonioguterres asks the international community for support: https://t.co/zfjZq4BMOO https://t.co/hdApv8TvGB

Every 2 weeks, on average 1 language becomes extinct.

Languages connect people. Let's protect them! More on #MotherLanguageDay: https://t.co/QTGQ34lLl3 https://t.co/07kWfuHhcG

"I am deeply saddened by the terrible suffering of the civilian population in eastern Ghouta: 400,000 people who live in hell on earth."

-- @antonioguterres on the situation in Syria. https://t.co/aMQXUlAQ8V https://t.co/0fjHShLDkQ

UN Peacekeepers come from different countries, cultures & backgrounds -- but share a common purpose to protect the most vulnerable. https://t.co/lZYeCoS6BZ #ServingForPeace https://t.co/CfZnr6KnNG

Japan           
Iceland
Singapore

What do these countries have in common? They are the safest for newborn babies. More in the latest @unicef report → https://t.co/1lesjlfLAa https://t.co/bi8R17z5Gx

Multilingualism is 🔑 to sustainability & peace. 

@UNESCO has more info on Wednesday's #MotherLanguageDay: https://t.co/QTGQ34lLl3 https://t.co/Y3AQBrRjGi

UN Peacekeepers from Tunisia leave their families behind and work in harsh conditions to protect others. Thank you, Tunisia, for your service & sacrifice. https://t.co/lZYeCp9I0z #ServingForPeace https://t.co/ydopgSvUSH

#TourTuesday: Kids Tours are a fun way for young visitors to UNHQ in #NYC to explore the work of the UN through games, puzzles & quizzes. 
More about these special tours here: https://t.co/S5ptESBc8K https://t.co/tRF1PIwUvN

This is a time for dialogue, for reconciliation, for reason.
I appeal for effective concerted action by all parties.
It is more important than ever.

-- @antonioguterres on the situation in the Middle East. https://t.co/P8Kro3qfgN
